channel.title: Marvelscape508/525! formaly known as Abbyscap3 517!
channel.description:
Hey, R0fl k0ed here.Im back with releasing servers.Ive been hosting this source and still am you can find it anywere name of the server is tittle lol.But anyways i want to release it because i want respect and so on.Pretty decent server some glitches but it can be fixed.I didnt add corp beast yet but am working on it.I might do a v3 of marvelscape but probably not this is Abbyscap3 v2 lol.The client is already connected to my ip if you want to join my server dont change anything.Anyways enjoy ? :D
MarvelScape517! Bunyip, Void Spinner, and Unicorn all heal hitpoints after a period of time. Zombie Survival miningame Lost City Quest. Dragon Battle Axe Special Clanwars Jad Mithril Dragons King Black Dragon Perfect Switching Working Multi Icons Vengeance with Hit Delay Tormented Demons NPC Noclipping Following Magic on Npc 100% SLOT SAVING WHEN YOU DRINK A POTION
[u]IMPORTANT!![/u] IF YOU WANT TO CHANGE CLIENT IP YOU NEED TO CHANGE IT IN LOADER.JAVA,CLIENT.JAVA,AND CLASS68_SUB20_SUB15 OR 15.
Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mgynzginq5l]MarvelScape 525 Client.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mgynzginq5l]MarvelScape 525 Client.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mgynzginq5l]MarvelScape 525 Client.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mgynzginq5l]MarvelScape 525 Client.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mgynzginq5l]MarvelScape 525 Client.rar[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mgynzginq5l]MarvelScape 525 Client.rar[/url]
Server Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5v2r1lapgzdugue]MarvelScape Server[/url] Server Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5v2r1lapgzdugue]MarvelScape Server[/url] Server Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5v2r1lapgzdugue]MarvelScape Server[/url] Server Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5v2r1lapgzdugue]MarvelScape Server[/url] Server Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5v2r1lapgzdugue]MarvelScape Server[/url]
PICTURES: [u]Home[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/home-3.jpg[/img] [u]Dungenoring armor[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/chaotic.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/primal.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/zephyrim.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/promethium.jpg[/img] [u]Specials[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/ags-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/claws-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/dfs.jpg[/img] [u]Bosses[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/gwds-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/torm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/avhlwp.png[/img] [u]Clanwars 100%[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/out.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/in.jpg[/img] [u]Prayers[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/untitled-2.jpg[/img] [u]Staff of Light&Divine Spirit Shield[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/sol.jpg[/img] [u]Overload&Rocktails[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/overload.jpg[/img] [u]Turmoil[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/turmoil.jpg[/img] [u]Zombie Survival Minigame[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/zombie.jpg[/img] [u]Lost City Quest[/u] [IMG]http://i789.photobucket.com/albums/yy172/range645/guest.jpg[/img]
